system.passengers:
Traits: Enhanced Motive Systems, Open-Topped, Walker
Servo-Lifter not intended for combat, all attacks suffer -10 to WS Tests. Instead for lifting things. Can be used to Grapple a target (Treat as Strength 70 with Unnatural Strength (+4), if successful target does not take damage, however if they do not escape by start of driver's next turn, target counts as helpless and is automatically hit by Servo-Lifter Weapon for double damage.
